hero.title: Discover Healthier Juice Options
hero.subtitle: Scan any juice product to get nutritional information and find healthier alternatives

feature1.title: Smart Upload & Scan
feature1.description: Upload and scan food labels or images to automatically extract nutritional information in seconds

feature2.title: Interactive Nutrition Chatbot
feature2.description: Get instant answers to your nutrition questions and personalized dietary advice

feature3.title: Intuitive Nutritional Dashboard
feature3.description: View clear, interactive visualizations of nutritional data to understand your food better

feature4.title: ML-Based Health Scoring
feature4.description: Our machine learning algorithm rates food healthiness based on multiple nutritional factors

feature5.title: Ingredient Risk Analyzer
feature5.description: Natural Language Processing detects potentially harmful or allergenic ingredients

feature6.title: Personalized Suggestions
feature6.description: Get recommendations for healthier alternative products based on your preferences

scan.title: Scan Your Product
scan.subtitle: Upload an image or take a photo of your juice product to analyze it
scan.upload_prompt: Drag & drop your image here or click to browse
scan.camera_prompt: Position the juice product within the frame
scan.barcode_prompt: Position the barcode within the frame
scan.upload_error: Please upload an image or take a photo first
scan.analysis_error: Failed to analyze the product. Please try again.

footer.newsletter_text: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and nutrition tips.
